Small-Sided Soccer League

Welcome to SuprNova

SuprNova is a small-sided soccer league based in Pittsburgh, designed for high school players and adults. Our teams consist of six players, offering fast-paced, competitive matches in a fun, pickup-style format. We're committed to delivering a high-quality experience—from top-tier equipment to fair and consistent officiating.

Whether you're looking to stay sharp, meet new teammates, or just enjoy the game, SuprNova is your place to play.

Ready to join the action? Sign up today and follow us on Instagram @suprnovasoccerleague to stay in the loop.
